column1: === {{TranslateThis | anchor = en | en = to | el = στο(ν)/στη(ν) }} === {{Property proposal |status = not done |description = {{TranslateThis | en = For use as a qualifier of statements with {{P|2882}} or {{P|2881}}. | ru = В качестве квалификатора утверждений с {{P|2882}} или {{P|2881}} ([[w:ru:Выбывание и повышение в классе]]). }} |subject item = |infobox parameter = |datatype = item |domain = |allowed values = |allowed units = |source = |example = {{claim|Q19346732|P2882|Q18716|to|Q24067533}}. |planned use = Add it to many pages that are using {{P|2882}} or {{P|2881}} |formatter URL = |see also = |filter = |robot and gadget jobs = |subpage = at |topic = generic }} ;Motivation I need a qualifier to show where a team promoted or relegated, to show where the team played the next season due to promotion or relegation of the previous season. [[User:Xaris333|Xaris333]] ([[User talk:Xaris333|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 23:11, 17 August 2016 (UTC)

;{{int:Talk}} * {{comment}} In English at least, I don't think that "at" is the right thing for your use case. I would expect "at" to have a value of a location, an event or a time of day. "to" is what I'd expect, or possibly something more specific if "to" is too generic for others. [[User:Thryduulf|Thryduulf]] ([[User talk:Thryduulf|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 00:35, 18 August 2016 (UTC)

* {{O}} This should be computable, once the old league is marked with its next highest and lowest league. [[User:Pigsonthewing|Andy Mabbett]] (Pigsonthewing); [[User talk:Pigsonthewing|Talk to Andy]]; [[Special:Contributions/Pigsonthewing|Andy's edits]] 11:36, 18 August 2016 (UTC)

*{{ec}} {{Replyto|Pigsonthewing}} It is only computable when both leagues have exactly one league above and exactly one league below, this is not always true. For example lower leagues very often have different geographical scope. For example a team relegated from {{Q|Q58916}} may play the next season in either {{Q|Q59041}} or {{Q|Q58915}} depending on geography not only of the relegated team but also that of other teams relegated to, promoted from and promoted to the level below {{Q|Q58916}}. A team in the Midlands may also move between leagues without promotion or relegation to balance the leagues (e.g. if only southern teams are relegated from the national level). The representation method on Wikidata must work for all levels, not just national to national. [[User:Thryduulf|Thryduulf]] ([[User talk:Thryduulf|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 12:28, 18 August 2016 (UTC)

:: It seems to me computable from the fact that the team is in session A in league X and in season B in league Y. If I additional know that the team was relegated it seems to me like all information is available. [[User:ChristianKl|ChristianKl]] ([[User talk:ChristianKl|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 20:41, 1 September 2016 (UTC)

* {{o}} as "to". There should be a better (maybe generalized term) for ''promoted'' or ''relegated'' --[[User:Succu|Succu]] ([[User talk:Succu|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:38, 15 September 2016 (UTC)
:[[User:Succu|Succu]] Like what? Suggest one... [[User:Xaris333|Xaris333]] ([[User talk:Xaris333|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 21:55, 15 September 2016 (UTC)
:: Nope, [[User:Xaris333|Xaris333]], it's your turn to clarify your propsal (at/to). --[[User:Succu|Succu]] ([[User talk:Succu|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 21:58, 15 September 2016 (UTC)

:::: But you are saying ''There should be a better (maybe generalized term)...''. How can you be sure about that? What are we going to do? We need the qualifier. [[User:Xaris333|Xaris333]] ([[User talk:Xaris333|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 13:45, 16 September 2016 (UTC)

[[User:ChristianKl|ChristianKl]], why? Can you suggest something else; I am trying to find something. [[User:Xaris333|Xaris333]] ([[User talk:Xaris333|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:17, 7 October 2016 (UTC)

:As I said above (and without getting a reply) the information is already possible to be calculated. Furthermore a short word like "to" as a high likelihood of being abused in for different purposes besides the one's defined here. [[User:ChristianKl|ChristianKl]] ([[User talk:ChristianKl|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:19, 7 October 2016 (UTC)
*'''Not done''', no consensus to create. -- [[User:Ajraddatz|Ajraddatz]] ([[User Talk:Ajraddatz|talk]]) 19:35, 31 October 2016 (UTC)
